name: Spincook
description:
Spin the Wheel, Cook the Meal!

Click and spin the cursor to spin the wheel: the faster the wheel spins, the bigger the flame! Match the flame size to the food stack height to cook it well. If you're having trouble controlling the flame, try changing the sensitivity settings.

Initial concept/prototype: Julian Kida, Gabriel Lacayo Jr.

Polish: Julian Kida, Gabriel Lacayo Jr., Brenna Moss, Nam Thai Hoang
